    • Method Detail

      • carryPet

        public <P> void carryPet(P player)

        Starts the given player carry his pet if is is currently spawned. Does nothing if the pet is already getting carried.

        See Also:
        player

      • dropPet

        public <P> void dropPet(P player)

        Lets the given player drop his pet if he is currently carrying it. Does nothing if the player isn't carrying it.

        See Also:
        player

      • throwPet

        public <P> void throwPet(P player)

        Lets the given player throw his pet if he is currently carrying. Does automatically drop it and does nothing if the player isn't carrying it.

        See Also:
        player

      • getCarryPetItemStack

        public <P,I> I getCarryPetItemStack(P player)

        Gets the itemstack from the carrying pet. Returns an empty optional if the player is carrying anything.

      • isCarryingPet

        public <P> boolean isCarryingPet(P player)

        Gets if the given player is carrying a pet.

      • clearResources

        public <P> void clearResources(P player)

        Clears all resources the given player may have allocated.

        See Also:
        player
